expression: zip(split(assetCodes,','), '.', substring(split(assetTypes,';'), 1, 4), (((currentPrice - purchasePrice) / purchasePrice * 100 * weight / totalWeight + dividendYield * 0.3) > riskThreshold ? (equals(substring(split(sectors,','), 1, 4), 'Tech') & marketCap > '1000000000' & peRatio < '25' & debtRatio < '0.4' ? '_premium_growth' : '_growth') : (currentPrice / purchasePrice > '0.9' ? '_stable' : '_risk')), '@', domain)
